commit.message:
Rollup merge of #80519 - max-heller:issue-80512-fix, r=varkor

Take type defaults into account in suggestions to reorder generic parameters

Fixes #80512

Rollup merge of #80519 - max-heller:issue-80512-fix, r=varkor

Take type defaults into account in suggestions to reorder generic parameters

Fixes #80512
